row.Name: SIEBEL_CFG_DATA_SOURCE
row.Value1: Datasource ( as in .cfg file ) that Siebel Tools connect to

row.Name: SIEBEL_CLIENT_ROOT
row.Value1: The Siebel client directory

row.Name: SIEBEL_ENTRPR_SERVER
row.Value1: The Siebel Enterprise name

row.Name: SIEBEL_GATEWAY_SERVER
row.Value1: The Siebel gateway server address

row.Name: SIEBEL_LANGUAGES
row.Value1: Comma separated list of the installed languages

row.Name: SIEBEL_OBJECT_MANAGERS
row.Value1: Comma separated list of Siebel Object Managers

row.Name: SIEBEL_ODBC_DATA_SOURCE
row.Value1: The ODBC system data source name that Siebel server uses to connect to the Siebel database on the RDBMS

row.Name: SIEBEL_PORT
row.Value1: The port number belongs to the SCBroker component

row.Name: SIEBEL_REPOSITORY_NAME
row.Value1: The name of the Siebel Repository

row.Name: SIEBEL_RETRY_NUMBER
row.Value1: Number of open session retries. Siebel will try to open a new session after a session is expired

row.Name: SIEBEL_ROOT
row.Value1: The Siebel home directory

row.Name: SIEBEL_SCRIPT_CFG_FILE
row.Value1: Siebel client config file name

row.Name: SIEBEL_SERVER_ROOT
row.Value1: The Siebel server root directory

row.Name: SIEBEL_SERVERS
row.Value1: Comma separated list siebel servers

row.Name: SIEBEL_SESSION_TIMEOUT
row.Value1: Transaction timeout (in seconds) on the client side. A session define time of user's inactivity

row.Name: SIEBEL_SRF_FILE
row.Value1: The Siebel SRF file

row.Name: SIEBEL_TABLE_OWNER
row.Value1: The Siebel Database Table Owner

row.Name: SIEBEL_TOOLS_CONFIG_FILE
row.Value1: The name of the config file of the siebel tools

row.Name: SIEBEL_TOOLS_ROOT
row.Value1: The installation or root directory for Siebel Tools

row.Name: SIEBEL_TXT_TIMEOUT
row.Value1: Transaction timeout (in milliseconds). A Siebel transaction is a series of user actions on a Siebel application

row.Name: SIEBEL_URL
row.Value1: Hostname/IP address of the siebel machine

row.Name: SIEBEL_WS_PUB_DIR
row.Value1: Siebel web server public directory

row.Name: UNIX_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT
row.Value1: The file name of the Environment Script. (Unix only). Default: siebenv.sh

row.Name: UNIX_SIEBEL_ENV_SCRIPT_DIR
row.Value1: The directory where the Siebel Environment script is placed. (Unix only)

row.Name: WIN_SIEBEL_SERVICES
row.Value1: Comma-separated list of Windows Siebel Server Services
